Package game.BottleManager

Class BottleManager

java.lang.Object
game.BottleManager.BottleManager
public class BottleManager
extends java.lang.Object
A global Singleton manager that holds bottles of Actors

    • getInstance

      public static BottleManager getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of bottle manager
      Returns:
      BottleManager singleton instance

    • check

      public void check​(Actor actor)
      Checks if the actor is a part of the Hashmap yet. If not, it checks the actor of its capabilities and sets a new Stack for the actor if true.
      Parameters:
      actor - The Stack of the Actor

    • addWater

      Adds Water to the Actor's current Stack
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • useWater

      public Water useWater​(Actor actor)

      Returns:
      the Water that will be used

    • length

      public int length​(Actor actor)
      Returns length of the Actor's current Stack

      Returns:
      the length of the Stack
